# Cancelled - Defence Construction Canada's Invitation to Bid: OR23SLBN

## Invitation Details

* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01016895
* **Publication Date**: December 13, 2022
* **Tender Status**: Cancelled
* **Closing Date**: March 31, 2026 (Time: 2:00 pm, Central Daylight Time)
* **GSIN**: 5121A - Construction of One and Two Dwelling Buildings, 5122A - Construction of Multi-Dwelling Buildings, 5129B - Construction of Industrial Buildings, 5139A, 5159B, 5123B, 5139C
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Europe, United States, Mexico, Canada

## Contracting Entity Details

* **Name**: Defence Construction Canada
* **Address**: Constitution Square, 19th Floor, 350 Albert Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K3, Canada
* **Contract Officer**: Mark Smith
* **Email**: mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: 613-859-0549

## Cancelled Notification

This notice has been cancelled. 

Please note the details above only include essential information and some minor formatting changes have been made for easier human comprehension. Extra details have not been included to keep this within the 300-400 character limitations. 

Below is the other version, following the exact specifications without the character limit.
